official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on natural gas prices.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that efforts should be taken to assure that: (1) artificially high natural gas wellhead prices are reduced; (2) certain contract provisions which artificially increase natural gas prices are eliminated; (3) natural gas companies justify price increases; (4) additional assistance is provided to individuals unable to pay residential heating costs; and (5) residential weatherization activities are increased.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on natural gas prices.
